nodes.text: Tabala Zo was a human female who lived during the era of the New Republic and the subsequent war between the First Order and the Resistance. Zo joined the Resistance; and was stationed at their D'Qar headquarters. Serving under General Leia Organa, a veteran of the Rebel Alliance and leader of the Resistance, she worked as an operations controller in Fleet Command. During the Battle of Starkiller Base, she monitored the firing cycle of the First Order's primary weapon.
After the conclusion of the Battle of Exegol, Zo celebrated the end of the First Order at the base on Ajan Kloss, where she was seen hugging another member of the Resistance.
Tabala Zo was portrayed by Philicia Saunders in the 2015 film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. She reprised the role in the 2019 sequel Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
